import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../services/AuthContext'; const Navbar = () => { const { logout } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return (
BILLPAY
Dashboard Wallets Transactions KYC
{isOpen && (
setIsOpen(false)}> Dashboard setIsOpen(false)}> Wallets setIsOpen(false)}> Transactions setIsOpen(false)}> KYC
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
